underlying_goal: Analyze a year's worth of weekly meeting notes and generate a structured self-evaluation report matching a specific PPT template format, referencing last year's evaluation as a style guide
friction_detail: Initial evaluation draft was not detailed enough compared to the previous year's format, requiring user to explicitly request more detail and volume matching the 2024 style.
brief_summary: User wanted a 2025 performance self-evaluation generated from weekly meeting notes matching a specific PPT template, and after iterative refinement got a detailed markdown draft they could transfer to PPT.
